snippet: Jacksonville Jaguars running back Maurice Jones-Drew ended his 38-day holdout — without a new contract — arriving at the training facility Sunday morning.
abstract: Jacksonville Jaguars running back Maurice Jones-Drew ends his 38-day holdout--without a new contract--and arrives at the team training facility; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jacksonville Jaguars running back Maurice Jones-Drew ended his 38-day holdout — without a new contract — arriving at the training facility Sunday morning.
